title: Old Sierra Adventure Games pack
description:
This is a pack of some very good old Sierra Adventure games.
This pack don't require any extra installation... so you can play directly.

All games are tested and fully work in DosBox 0.72. http://www.dosbox.com/download.php?main=1
If you don't like DosBox or want an alternative, try http://freesci.linuxgames.com/ but it will work only with older games who use SCI systems. (king quest etc..)

The "CODE" folder is where you will find answer to protection system on some games.
The "SOLVE" folder is where you will find solutions for all games, try to finish them without solve ;).

Games (71mb, UNPACKED!):

  - Codename Iceman: v1.033           (Sciv.exe)
  - King's Quest 1 : v1.000.051 (SCI) (Sciv.exe)
  - King's Quest 2 (old one)          (KQ2.COM)
  - King's Quest 3 (old one)          (KQ3.COM)
  - King's Quest 4 : v1.000.111       (SIERRA.EXE)  (PROTECTED)
  - Leisure Suit Larry 1 : (VGA one)  (SCIDHUV.EXE) (PROTECTED)
  - Leisure Suit Larry 2              (SIERRA.EXE)  (PROTECTED)
  - Leisure Suit Larry 3 (En/Fr)      (SIERRA.COM)
  - Leisure Suit Larry 5              (SCIDHUV.EXE) (PROTECTED)
  - Space quest 1 (Enhanced version)  (SCIDHUV.EXE) (PROTECTED)
  - Space quest 2                     (SIERRA.COM)
  - Space quest 3 v1.0                (SIERRA.COM)
  - Police quest 1 VGA                (SCIDHUV.EXE) (PROTECTED)
  - Police quest 2                    (SIERRA.COM)
  - Police quest 3                    (SCIDHUV.EXE)
  - Quest for Glory 1                 (SCIV.EXE)    (PROTECTED)
  - Conquest of the Longbow           (SCIDHUV.EXE) (PROTECTED)
  - Colonel bequest                   (SCIV.EXE)    (PROTECTED)
  - Conquest of Camelot               (SCIV.EXE)

Note: There is no "Leisure Suit Larry 4" cause it was never released. ;)

Please report any mistakes. (protection code who don't work etc...)

Greets: All who made manual scan, solve etc... Thanks!

Have fun!
